title: MLB.TV Archive Playback
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a MLB.TV user taps on the MLB.TV button
and navigates to a game from previous season
and taps on an archive feed

title: Postseason - More Menu
custom_preconds: Given the user has At Bat installed
custom_steps: When a Dev changes the Tab Bar priority in the iPhone config ("tabBarPriorities":) to have Postseason view in the More Menu
custom_expected:
Then the Postseason view is in the More Menu
and the user is able to tap on the view
and the data loads
and the user is able to view each round of the Postseason

title: Postseason - Tab Bar
custom_preconds: Given the user has At Bat installed
custom_steps: When a Dev changes the Tab Bar priority ("tabBarPriorities":) in the iPhone config to have Postseason view in the tab bar
custom_expected:
Then the Postseason view is in the Tab Bar
and the user is able to tap on the view
and the data loads
and the user is able to view each round of the Postseason

title: Scoreboard - Previous Year
custom_preconds: Given the user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the Scoreboard
and scrolls through the dates of the previous season
custom_expected: Then the user is able to view all of the games specified in the previous season

title: Scoreboard - Next Year
custom_preconds: Given the user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the Scoreboard
and scrolls through the dates of the next season
custom_expected: Then the user is able to view all of the games specified in the next season

title: Gameday - Wrap
custom_preconds: Given the user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When the user taps on a game from the previous season
from the Scoreboard or Team Schedule
custom_expected:
Then the user will see Wrap and the following data will be present:
Team Logos and records
Team Names
Score
Winning and Losing Pitchers (Saves, if applicable)

title: Gameday - Preview
custom_preconds: Given the user has At Bat installed
custom_steps: When a user is viewing a game preview for the next season
custom_expected: Then the user will see the team names, team logos, venue, start time (or TBD)

title: Config - 2 season support
custom_preconds: Given the user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a Dev sets two seasons in the "supportedSeasons": parameter in the iPhone config (use the attached config files)
and the user opens At Bat

custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user is able to view both seasons
then the user is able to view both seasons
then the user is able to view both seasons
